name: Jaglana Shop
description: My most ambitious commercial project which I am very proud of. It took a lot of effort to understand and solve all the issues related to building an e-commerce web app from scratch. I used Wordpress as a headless CMS and built an individual front-end by myself, including design and coding. This project helped me with understanding some main principles of communication between Wordpress/Woocommerce GraphQL API and the UI layer.

name: Jaglana Homepage
description: Project with which I won my first client. A simple design which shown my skills to the restaurant owner and led to further cooperation between us. I got to know some new tools such as GatsbyJS, GraphQL and styled-components.

name: F1 Drivers Database
description: My first React project, including some more complex concepts than a simple to-do list. React Router and dynamic data fetching from a simple API were implemented. Despite its relative simplicity, F1 Database helped me to understand some basic React techniques and furtherly excercise my CSS skills.
